name: She's your valentine
tagline: A collection of gifts for the special lady in your life. Spoil her this Valentine's.

gifts.name: Classic zip up hoodie
gifts.description: Dreamy. Comfortable. Stylish. A sure winner

image.alt_text: Image of Classic zip up hoodie. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Oh so fine (pearl) bracelet
gifts.description: Delicate jewellery for the delicate one in your life

image.alt_text: Image of Oh so fine (pearl) bracelet. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Votch solar watch
gifts.description: This is a classic. And, it'll help your loved get to dinner with you on time.

image.alt_text: Image of Votch solar watch. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Estella Bartlett Mini Jewellery Box
gifts.description: An adorable box for your loved one's jewellery. Just expect them to want you to fill it with sparkly things.

image.alt_text: Image of Estella Bartlett Mini Jewellery Box. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: SILKE London Frida Hair Ties
gifts.description: Keep it small and thoughtful this Valentine's with these silk hair ties.

image.alt_text: Image of SILKE London Frida Hair Ties. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: FOREO Luna mini facial cleansing brush
gifts.description: Give your loved one this facial cleanser.

image.alt_text: Image of FOREO Luna mini facial cleansing brush. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Luxury silk pyjamas
gifts.description: A true bit of luxury to make your loved one feel special. Extra special.

image.alt_text: Image of Luxury silk pyjamas. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: At-home lash lift kit
gifts.description: A great gift for that special someone this Valentine's

image.alt_text: Image of At-home lash lift kit. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Gold fine chain necklace
gifts.description: A beautiful, fine chain necklace that will become a staple for your loved one for years to come.

image.alt_text: Image of Gold fine chain necklace. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Heart chocolate selection box
gifts.description: Is a box of top quality chocolates ever a bad idea? We don't think so.

image.alt_text: Image of Heart chocolate selection box. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Loving candle
gifts.description: A loved one with feel spoilt with this candle designed by fashion and interior designer Bella Freud.

image.alt_text: Image of Loving candle. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Renpho Eye Massager
gifts.description: Life is tiring. Your loved one deserves this.

image.alt_text: Image of Renpho Eye Massager. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Augustinus Bader Eye Patches
gifts.description: Give your loved one that little pick me up with these energising eye patches.

image.alt_text: Image of Augustinus Bader Eye Patches. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Big love mug
gifts.description: Say I love you with the Big Love mug!

image.alt_text: Image of Big love mug. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: SURI Sustainable Electric Toothbrush
gifts.description: A beautiful and sustainable toothbrush that'll be sure to make her smile.

image.alt_text: Image of SURI Sustainable Electric Toothbrush. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Dream journal
gifts.description: A beautiful journal for all her dreams, hopefully starring a certain you!

image.alt_text: Image of Dream journal. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Love cushion
gifts.description: A little patchwork, a lot of love – the perfect cosy Valentine’s gift.

image.alt_text: Image of Love cushion. A great gift to give someone special.
